internal.content:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage';

export default HomepageTemplate;

## Getting Started

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    subTitle="Industry Background"
    title="Background of industry and Threat trends"
    href="/industry/background"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    >

![](../images/industry.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    subTitle="Threat Modelling"
    title="Critical assets identification, diamond models and intelligence buy-in"
    href="/threat/assets"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    >

![](../images/threats.jpg)

</ArticleCard>

</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    subTitle="About us"
    title="Group members information and Team Roles"
    href="/about/members"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    >

![](../images/about-us.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

MdxNode.rawBody:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage';

export default HomepageTemplate;

## Getting Started

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    subTitle="Industry Background"
    title="Background of industry and Threat trends"
    href="/industry/background"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    >

![](../images/industry.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    subTitle="Threat Modelling"
    title="Critical assets identification, diamond models and intelligence buy-in"
    href="/threat/assets"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    >

![](../images/threats.jpg)

</ArticleCard>

</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    subTitle="About us"
    title="Group members information and Team Roles"
    href="/about/members"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    >

![](../images/about-us.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>
